_header: As I yode on a Monday between Wyltinden and Walle
Note: Contains an early form of Erceldoune’s prophecy: see 620.
_description: A ballad on the Scottish Wars — sixty-three quatrains

BLCottJulAV.First Lines:
Als y yod on a monnday by twene Wylunden and WalleMe ane after
                    brade waye ay litel man y mette with alle…
BLCottJulAV.Last Lines:
…And þan sal reson raike and ride and wisdome be ware es
                    bestAnd leaute sal gar leal habide and sithen sal hosbond men af
                    rest
